GirlCode1.GirlCode_Details: Her ex is off-limits forever. No guy is worth losing your best friend over.

GirlCode2.GirlCode_Details: What she tells you about him stays between you two. Loyalty over gossip, always.

GirlCode3.GirlCode_Details: If you see a red flag in her dating life, speak up—with love and honesty.

GirlCode4.GirlCode_Details: If you know he’s cheating, tell her fast. She deserves truth from you, not rumors.

GirlCode5.GirlCode_Title: Never Ditch Her for a Guy
GirlCode5.GirlCode_Details: Don't bail on her for a date. Real friends keep their priorities straight.

GirlCode6.GirlCode_Details: Jump in if a guy’s being weird. Your bestie’s safety comes before politeness.

GirlCode7.GirlCode_Details: Never compete for attention. Build her up—there’s room for both to shine.

GirlCode8.GirlCode_Details: Even if you disagree, support her heart—unless he’s toxic or harmful.

GirlCode9.GirlCode_Details: If she likes him, you don’t. Friendship over flirting, every single time.

GirlCode10.GirlCode_Title: Own It If You Mess Up
GirlCode10.GirlCode_Details: If you break the code, apologize fast. Real friends make things right.
